sections.heading: or promotional materials; restriction
sections.text: Any advertising or promotional materials relating to the Nebraska educational savings plan trust may include references to a public office but shall not refer to an officeholder by name.SourceLaws 2000, LB 1003, § 5;R.S.1943, (2024), § 85-1805;Laws 2025, LB647,

77-1418.Advertising or promotional materials; restriction.

Any advertising or promotional materials relating to the Nebraska educational savings plan trust may include references to a public office but shall not refer to an officeholder by name.

SourceLaws 2000, LB 1003, § 5;R.S.1943, (2024), § 85-1805;Laws 2025, LB647, § 43.Operative Date: October 1, 2025
